name: Friday Night Funkin' Family Friendly
description:
Mod that makes FNF safe to play for the whole family. Expect updates at any time because I am still working on the thing. It might not work as well as you'd expect, so expect crashes or random bugs.

LET ME KNOW IN THE COMMENTS IF THERE IS A BUG. I will check comments often so if there is a bug in this mod, don't hesitate to ask me to fix it!

My 1st YouTube channel (Noah the Spike) for anyone that wants to watch random gameplay videos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO0dDbArVRv27pBISZuakjg

My 2nd YouTube channel (Spoopy Story Times with Phantom Foxy) for anyone that wants to hear creepy stories while watching gameplay of random games: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpNsKEyl8LnGdE3X3kbxTmA

To do:

 - Change song titles in Week 4 to be better suited for the family

- Finish polishing up Week 5 sprites

Where to find any changes after updates:

Look in PLAYER-README.txt to see any changes as that is my current changelog for this mod.

Almost all art, music, and programming go to the original devteam on the original game.

Original game: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin
